content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment for your HVAC needs. May I please have your name to get started?
Thank you, Linda! Can you please provide your address so we can confirm you’re within our service area?
Great, thank you! What type of HVAC service do you need help with today?
My air conditioner isn't keeping the house cool, so I need someone to check it out.
Thank you for letting me know. When would be the ideal time for our technician to come by and take a look at your air conditioner?
Before I book anything, can I get a price estimate? I'm looking at a few different companies first.

Absolutely! Our price for an HVAC diagnostic visit starts at $89. If further repairs are needed, the technician will review the issue and provide an upfront quote before beginning any work. Would you like to schedule the diagnostic visit?
Thanks but I want to get a few more quotes first. I’ll let you know if I want to schedule.
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies before scheduling.

content: Thank you for considering XYZ Home Services, Linda! We understand. If you have any questions or decide to book with us in the future, just send a message anytime. Have a great day!
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies before scheduling.
